query:
update word set
    source_text =
        case
            when $2::text[] != '{}' and $2[1] is not null then $2[1]
            else source_text
        end,
    simple_phonetics =
        case
            when $3::text[] != '{}' and $3[1] is not null then $3[1] 
            else simple_phonetics
        end,
    commentary =
        case
            when $4::text[] != '{}' and $4[1] is not null then $4[1]
            else commentary
        end
where id = $1
returning word.document_id;
